Writer: Dan Aykroyd (story), Dave Thomas (story), Dan Aykroyd (screenplay), Lowell Ganz (screenplay), Babaloo Mandel (screenplay)
Title: Spies Like Us
Actors: Mark Stewart, Sean Daniel, Bruce Davison, William Prince
Plot: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.
